name: Ninefold Port
role_in_state: primary maritime entrep√¥t and shipbuilding hub
economy_niches: saltworks and fish-curing for long voyages
culture_adjustments: ritualized launch and keel-binding ceremonies intensified
port-dialect mercantile argot more compressed and loanword-rich
stronger clan-led dock governance than elsewhere in state
guild-chartered secrecy in shipwright technical registers
market-day contract adjudication folded into public rites
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
combustion-derived industry limited (no high-pressure steam megatech)
navigational auguries cannot replace charts or seamanship
notes: dock layout follows nine tidal berths tied to augury slots
launch-day markets double as contract courts and oath-places
keelwright registers contain guarded procedural charms for hull cures
